column2: Description
Unique ID for each row of data (i.e. each effect size)
Unique ID for each paper
Unique ID for each cohort of birds…
Unique ID for each species
Common name of species from paper
Latin name of species
Species split into waterbird, landbird or seabird based on Geen et al. 2019
Male, female, or both/unknown
Number of individuals
Number of observations per individual
Method of calculating repeatability, correlation (r) or ICC
Repeatability value
Any fixed effects (or additional random effects) included in repeatability calculation: yes or no
If yes, what additional variables are included
Whether unstandardized variance components are reported
Tracking method: conventional (ringing, colour-ringing), geolocator (geolocation), or GPS (GPS, satellite, PTT)
Period of annual cycle which repeatability is measured (arrival to, or departure from, breeding or non-breeding grounds)
Location of tagging (as written by paper)
Continent of tagging location: North America, Europe, or Other
Longitude of tagging location
Latitude of tagging location
Whether individuals were tagged on the breeding or non-breeding grounds
General comments
Where in the paper the data is location
Text, figure or table
Title of the paper
Publication year of paper
Authors of the paper
Journal the paper was published in
DOI of the paper
An ID that is used to link the paper for data extraction to the record of screened full texts
